name: Bruxelles Free Illustrations Set
description:
About Bruxelles

Bruxelles is inspired by the 'Ligne claire' style popularized by the Belgian comic 'Tintin'. It focuses on the beauty and simplicity of line drawings, keeping the colors light and subtle.


Included Features

  1. Customizable strokes and colors
  2. Free Figma plugin that allows for instant search, magic resize, and drag and drop capabilities.
  3. Free global color editor to swap colors in 1 click via our web app.
  4. All 25,000+ illustrations at Streamline are free as PNGs.

About Streamline

For 12 years, Streamline has made the largest, most consistent illustration sets on the internet. Many of the world's best designers like Tobias Van Schneider, Khoi Vinh, recommend Streamline.
